item.title: EM epicmontage
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

The original Firefox is based on the original NetScape. As for this topic, this forum is for web design. Get out.

Read full topic

item.title: EM epicmontage
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:12, topic:200273”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=264937.msg2192538#msg2192538 date=1208410659]
Are you being sarcastic? Because that’s what he means.
[/quote]

No. He’s saying that Firefox is based on Netscape.[/quote]
My bad.
After Netscape version 6, it is based on the Mozilla Browser, (the predecessor to Firefox), then as of version 8, it is based on Firefox. How ever, by the time Netscape 8 was released, it had fell almost entirely out of use. I just assumed Firefox was based on Netscape due to the prefix of “ns” on a lot of the core sourcecode.

/derailed.

Read full topic

item.title: EM epicmontage
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

A few tips:
Get rid of Voodoo; he makes your site seem very unprofessional with words like “Boiiiii”.
Make the site wider; the forums are so narrow that when a few small images are posted it stretches the text box.
Change your gay as hell avatar, everyone knows IE sucks and you don’t need some tacky avatar to explain this.
Get rid of the premium feature, add that in when you get more members.

Read full topic
